description: This time I met a student in need. His financial plans didn´t work out too well and now he needed 20 000 to pay the school fee for another semester. He studied economics so I guess the school wasn´t very good. The boy also wanted to go on a trip to England before the school year started. Well, he looked good so I decided to complicate the deal a bit. I wanted him to agree to my alternative and naughty proposal. Only problem was his mother, who was in the living room. Yes, that´s right. I fucked this cute young man right under his mother´s nose. I almost wished she would catch us in the act. The boy was trying really hard to please me and maybe he even enjoyed it. He got a boner pretty fast and then unloaded with my cock up the ass.
title: Debt Dandy 261
